data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_24d08ed788a9f5984bcf3b732ddcaf04.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Mathilda gains <font color="a6aafb">Ancestral Guidance</font> while moving. When it's fully charged, her next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the target and granting her 80 extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.

Mathilda resonates with the power of her ancestors for 4s, attracting wisps as her movement distance increases (up to 6 wisps).

At the end of the skill's duration, or when Mathilda casts this skill again, the wisps will seek and attack nearby enemies, each dealing 275<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and revealing the enemies' positions briefly. Subsequent damage dealt by wisps to the same target decays to 40%.

Mathilda leaps in the target direction and creates a field around her, gaining a 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+180% Total Magic Power)</font> shield and 25% extra Movement Speed for 3s. Allied heroes who come into contact with the field will receive a 60% shield and <font color="a6aafb">Guiding Wind</font>. The first allied hero that triggers <font color="a6aafb">Guiding Wind</font> will be guided to Mathilda, and both of them will gain the same Movement Speed boost.

When casting this skill during <font color="a6aafb">Circling Eagle</font>, Mathilda won't change her position.
<font color="a6aafb">Guiding Wind</font> expires 2s after the hero leaves Mathilda's field.

Mathilda applies a <font color="a6aafb">Soul Mark</font> to the target enemy hero and circles around them for up to 3.5s, during which her wisps will fly into nearby enemies, each dealing 40<font color="62f8fe"> (+15% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. The Soul Mark will also slow the target by 15% and <font color="a6aafb">Soul Bloom</font> will prioritize the target with Soul Mark.
Within the duration, Mathilda can select an area to dash to. At the end of the duration, she'll dash at the target with <font color="a6aafb">Soul Mark</font>, dealing 320<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> while knocking enemies in her path airborne for 0.6s, transferring the <font color="a6aafb">Soul Mark</font> to the first enemy hero that she knocks airborne, and reducing the skill cooldown by 40%.
Mathilda gains Control Immunity and a 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+160% Total Magic Power)</font> shield for the skill duration.

data.name: Mathilda

emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Favor:
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Favor: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+850 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Physical Defense
+20 Extra Magic Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: The Prestige ASMO
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A brave girl who stands up and doesn't fear power.

assist.desc: Mathilda works well with high burst damage heroes who can use Guiding Wind and follow up her Ultimate to secure kills, such as Saber and Eudora.

strong.desc: Mathilda excels in harassment and single-target CC, making her a great counter to squishy heroes with no escape skills, like Gord and Vale.

weak.desc: Mathilda is countered by Tanks with multiple CC skills, such as Franco and Minsitthar.
